description: Search the runbooks knowledge base for remediation procedures matching a category or symptom. Use this to find operational runbooks that describe how to diagnose and fix common infrastructure and application issues.

configuration.query: FROM runbooks | WHERE TO_LOWER(category) == TO_LOWER(?search_term) | KEEP title, severity, symptoms, root_cause, remediation_steps, prevention | LIMIT 5

search_term.description: Category to search (database, microservices, application, infrastructure, security). Case-insensitive.
